name: shredder
content:

Add to word list
a tool or machine that is used for cutting things into very small pieces: a paper/document/vegetable shredder Much of the documentary evidence against her had been put through the shredder before she was arrested.

a machine used for cutting things into very small pieces

a machine for cutting documents into small pieces so that they cannot be read: Put papers you no longer need in a cross-cut shredder.
